DocAttribute.Name: Operator
DocAttribute.Documentation: The Boolean operator used in the operation to create the result.

DocAttribute.Name: FirstOperand
DocAttribute.Documentation: The first operand to be operated upon by the Boolean operation.

DocAttribute.Name: SecondOperand
DocAttribute.Documentation: The second operand specified for the operation.

DocAttribute.Name: Dim
DocAttribute.Documentation: The space dimensionality of this entity. It is identical with the space dimensionality of the first operand. A where rule ensures that both operands have the same space dimensionality.

DocWhereRule.Name: SameDim
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The dimensionality of the first operand shall be the same as the dimensionality of the second operand.

DocWhereRule.Name: FirstOperandClosed
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the _FirstOperand_ is of type _IfcTessellatedFaceSet_ it has to be a closed tessellation.

DocWhereRule.Name: SecondOperandClosed
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If the _SecondOperand_ is of type _IfcTessellatedFaceSet_ it has to be a closed tessellation.
